modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon emphasizes human 'non-pouvoir' (helplessness) and God's 'pouvoir' (the power to tear the veil).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From S2 (the reality of the veil) to ~S1 (human exclusion) to S1 (Christ's death) to ~S2 (open access).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved by a divine act (tearing the veil) that humans could not perform.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the barrier is described as thick, heavy, and insurmountable.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. It identifies the human condition as 'helpless' and makes God the sole agent of the primary salvific action.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Potential Exemplarism in the 'Rush Counselor' metaphor
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: maybe we will... become Rush counsellors instead

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: puts the quietus on that beloved American scripture, 'God helps those who help themselves.'
the veil of the temple was rent in twain from top to bottom

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Biblical figures are not used as moral models; rather, the Temple structure is used as a theological map.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief from the 'precarious business' of self-justification.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Justification is extra nos (outside of ourselves).

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the primary program (salvation) to the secondary (ethics) is perfectly handled via the 'therefore' of Hebrews.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: his blood was sprinkled... on the heavenly mercy seat

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The 'Story' itself acts as the means of grace that empowers the hearer.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon maintains a strict hierarchy where God's action (Subject) creates a new reality for the hearer (Receiver).

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (the veil/exclusion) is sufficiently formidable.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This is a masterclass in grace-oriented preaching. It successfully uses a secular narrative (sorority rush) to illustrate a theological reality without letting the human story hijack the divine Subjectivity.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: While rhetoric would focus on the 'Rush' anecdote's pathos, Greimas shows it functions as a 'Negative Helper' that highlights the Subject's (God's) unique power.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis explains the Temple; semiotics explains how the Temple functions as a 'Barrier' actant that only a 'Divine Subject' can overcome.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that the 'maybe' in the conclusion is not a new mandate (Devoir) but a potential fruit of the new competence (Pouvoir) granted by the Primary Program.

appendices.notities: The sermon follows Fleming Rutledge's grammar of grace almost perfectly.
